Author: InhumanConnections
Text: The calorie counts are all online as well as the ingredients and nutrition facts, plus they explain why each ingredient is beneficial. For example: “Organic Cauliflower - Low in calories, but high in vitamins C and K, this cruciferous veggie is anti-inflammatory, immunity-boosting, and helps with healthy digestion.”  You can get it as a weekly or monthly plan. For weekly you can choose to be shipped 6-26 cups. For monthly it’s 24-26 cups. I do the monthly since they’re not everything I eat, I also use meal replacement drinks and eat some normal food.

Author: DontMatronizeMe
Text: So glad you're feeling healthy while also feeling good about yourself! Tell me a little bit more about this, if you don't mind? Do they publish their calorie counts or just list all ingredients? Is this a monthly service for a flat fee?
